short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically replaces all occurrences containing "pro" with "bro" on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you always dreamed of having a Bro ? 
- Now you have a lot !

Do you think your days are too Professionals ? 
- Now they will be more Brofessionals.

You have a Bro and you think about him all the time ? 
- Well now you can think of him more.

Tired of people telling you to be a Pro ? 
- Show them the way to become a Bro.

Have fun Bro !
